Actions.ActionName: Format new macros and deleted macros to fit template

Actions.Parameter: Prepare new and deleted macros for report

Actions.ActionName: Extract a list of all unlabeled macros in all groups

Actions.Text:
SELECT Group_Name, Macro_Name, Group_ID
FROM macros_new
WHERE Macro_Status IS NULL OR Macro_Status=''

Actions.ActionName: Get the count of matching macros

Actions.Parameter: Extract all non-labeled macros from the database

ElseActions.Parameter: No macros without a status to process

Actions.ActionName: Split group name, macro name, and group ID
Check if group exists with same name in prior backup
If the group doesn't exist, it was renamed, so find it based on ID

Actions.Text:
SELECT Group_Name
FROM groups_old
WHERE Group_ID = '%Variable%local_theGroupID%'

ElseActions.ActionName: Add it to the list of items in the modified section of the report
Set the status of the modified macro in the database

Actions.ActionName: Protect the apostrophes on UPDATE commands
Protect the apostrophes on UPDATE commands

Actions.Text:
UPDATE macros_new
SET Macro_Status = 'modified'
WHERE Group_Name = '%Variable%local_theGroup%'
AND Macro_name = '%Variable%local_theName%'

ThenActions.ActionName: If hard links enabled, replace with hard link to prior backup's version
Set the status of the identical macro in the database

Actions.ActionName: Protect the apostrophes on UPDATE commands
Protect the apostrophes on UPDATE commands

Actions.Text:
UPDATE macros_new
SET Macro_Status = 'identical'
WHERE Group_Name = '%Variable%local_theGroup%'
AND Macro_name = '%Variable%local_theName%'

ThenActions.ActionName: Add it to the list of items in the modified section of the report - we don't include this section, though
Get list of groups with modified macros

Actions.Text:
SELECT DISTINCT grn.Group_Name
FROM macros_new mn
JOIN groups_new grn ON mn.Group_ID = grn.Group_ID
WHERE mn.Macro_Status = 'modified';

ThenActions.ActionName: Apply modified label to groups with modified macros

ThenActions.Parameter: Processed all macros without a known status

Actions.ActionName: Process the moved, renamed, and moved-and-renamed macros
Extract full list of moved, renamed, etc. (plus in renamed groups) macros

Actions.Text:
SELECT Group_Name, Macro_Name, Group_ID, Macro_ID, Macro_Status
FROM macros_new
WHERE Macro_Status = 'moved' OR Macro_Status='renamed' OR Macro_Status='movedrenamed'
OR Macro_Status='grouprenamed'

Actions.ActionName: Get the count of matching macros

Actions.Text:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM macros_new
WHERE Macro_Status = 'moved' OR Macro_Status='renamed'
OR Macro_Status='movedrenamed' OR Macro_Status='grouprenamed'

ElseActions.Title: Generic comment with Helvetica text
ElseActions.ActionName: No moved, renamed, or moved and renamed macros - do anything??

Actions.Text:
SELECT go.Group_Name
FROM macros_new mn
JOIN macros_old mo ON mn.Macro_ID = mo.Macro_ID
JOIN groups_old go ON mo.Group_ID = go.Group_ID
WHERE mn.Macro_ID = '%Variable%local_theMacroID%'

Actions.Text:
SELECT go.Group_Name
FROM macros_new mn
JOIN macros_old mo ON mn.Macro_ID = mo.Macro_ID
JOIN groups_old go ON mo.Group_ID = go.Group_ID
WHERE mn.Macro_ID = '%Variable%local_theMacroID%'

SELECT Macro_Name
FROM macros_old
WHERE Macro_ID = '%Variable%local_theMacroID%'
